card.desc: EXPRESS is a service that offers door to door delivery or packages in a fast time, mostly by air.
REGULAR is a service that offers door-to-door delivery or package services by land and sea that focuses on more efficient costs while still providing certainty of delivery time.
CONTAINER is a service that offers door-to-door package delivery or High Value Shipment services by providing Full Container Load or Less Container Load tailored to customer needs.
TRUCKING is a service that offers door-to-door package delivery or High Value Shipment services by providing Full Trucking Load or Less Trucking Load tailored to customer needs

EXIM (EXPORT IMPORT) is a service that offers shipping services, both export and import door to door containers and kg-base, as well as custom clearance services. This service comes with two options, Air Freight and Sea Freight.
LINKEXPRESS is a service that offers e-commerce shipping services with regular service standards with the best leadtime.
